name: com.qualcomm.snapdragon.spaces.fusion
description: Dual Render Fusion is offered as an experimental package to supplement the Snapdragon Spaces for Unity SDK, supporting full simultaneous use of the mobile touchscreen and AR glasses on supported Snapdragon Spaces Development Kits. This distribution is currently being offered as an early release package for evaluation and feedback. APIs are subject to change.

samples.description: These are samples on how to work with the Snapdragon Spaces Dual Render Fusion package.
